review: The FireTV works great for watching Netflix, Hulu Plus and Amazon Instant Video.  It's fast, easy to use and reliable.  I also like how it supports Plex, which lets you stream a variety of non-iTunes media files from your computer (which you can't do on an AppleTV).  The hardware is fast and plays media better than an AppleTV.My single, HUGE complaint is that there is still no HBO Go support despite it being repeatedly promised.  To me that's a dealbreaker and I'd return this device now and go w/ a slower, less feature-rich AppleTV in exchange for HBO Go support.  Also, the Showtime app only supports a handful of cable providers, Comcast not being one of them.
